property.address: Lot 15, Concession 5, Township of Puslinch, Wellington County, ON
property.legal_description: Part of Lot 15, Concession 5, designated as Part 1 on Reference Plan 61R-12345

easement.access_requirements: Permanent access road to tower locations

appraiser_notes: Subject property is a productive cash crop operation with Class 1 soils. The 500kV transmission line will cross the property diagonally, affecting approximately 4 acres. Three steel lattice towers will be located on the property. Permanent access road required. Highest and best use remains agricultural but with moderate operational impact.
